verses.verse: The <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> I <S%G3870>exhort,<s%> who am also an <S%G4850>elder,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3144>witness<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> also a <S%G2844>partaker<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> that <S%G3195>shall<s%> be revealed: <S%G601><s%>

Feed <S%G4165><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4168>flock<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> which is <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> taking the <S%G1983>oversight<s%> thereof, <S%G3361>not<s%> by <S%G317>constraint,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1596>willingly;<s%> <S%G3366>not<s%> for filthy <S%G147>lucre,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> of a ready <S%G4290>mind;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G750>Shepherd<s%> shall <S%G5319>appear,<s%> ye shall <S%G2865>receive<s%> a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%> that fadeth not <S%G262>away.<s%>

Likewise, <S%G3668><s%> ye <S%G3501>younger,<s%> submit <S%G5293>yourselves<s%> unto the <S%G4245>elder.<s%> <S%G1161>Yea,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> of you be <S%G5293>subject<s%> one to <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be clothed <S%G1463>with<s%> <S%G5012>humility:<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G498>resisteth<s%> the <S%G5244>proud,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1325>giveth<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> to the <S%G5011>humble.<s%>

Humble <S%G5013>yourselves<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2900>mighty<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G5312>exalt<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> due time: <S%G2540><s%>

Be <S%G3525>sober,<s%> be <S%G1127>vigilant;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G476>adversary<s%> the <S%G1228>devil,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G5612>roaring<s%> <S%G3023>lion,<s%> walketh <S%G4043>about,<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> <S%G5101>whom<s%> he may devour: <S%G2666><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G436>resist<s%> <S%G4731>steadfast<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> that <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3804>afflictions<s%> are <S%G2005>accomplished<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G81>brethren<s%> that are <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5485>grace,<s%> who hath <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> after that ye have <S%G3958>suffered<s%> a <S%G3641>while,<s%> make you <S%G2675>perfect,<s%> <S%G5209><s%> <S%G4741>establish,<s%> <S%G4599>strengthen,<s%> <S%G2311>settle<s%> you.

By <S%G1223><s%> <S%G4610>Silvanus,<s%> a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> I <S%G3049>suppose,<s%> I have <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1223>briefly,<s%> <S%G3641><s%> <S%G3870>exhorting,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1957>testifying<s%> that <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1511>is<s%> the <S%G227>true<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> ye <S%G2476>stand.<s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> church that is <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G897>Babylon,<s%> elected together <S%G4899>with<s%> you, <S%G782>saluteth<s%> <S%G5209>you;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> so doth <S%G3138>Mark<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5207>son.<s%>

Greet <S%G782><s%> ye one <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G5370>kiss<s%> of <S%G26>charity.<s%> <S%G1515>Peace<s%> be with <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
